name: UnSeen (Ein Yan Htet)
description:
Finding out that your world’s resources are dwindling you decide to seek help from the council of magic. The council hears your prayers and opens a magical portal to a place rich with resources. However, the portal places you inside an underground cavern guarded by the world's inhabitants. For the sake of your own world, you decide to launch an invasion to take all the world's resources. In order for you to do that, you must fight through the levels of defense that the underground cavern prepare and reach the surface to claim the world’s resources.

Instructions

  • To clear each level, the player must use his gold and send out Exling to try and reach the end of the path.
  • The player must clear all three levels of the game to win the game.

How to Play:

Spawn display:

  • Click the icons to spawn the respective Exling on the path
  • The cool down timer will be set upon spawning

Stats display:

  • Gold (left icon): Your current amount of gold that increases over time
  • Attacks (middle icon): Number of required Exling to finish the level
  • Exlings remaining (right icon): Number of available Exlings for the level

Game World

  • Top-Down view
    • Open path from the bottom leading to a Gate at the top
    • Bottom path where player sends his army against AI
  • Exlings (Avatars) are sent to move along the path from the bottom to top where the Gate is set.
  • Different towers (NPCs) are placed on the land and face to the path once Exlings start moving on the path.
  • The higher the level is, more NPCs and avatars can be seen on land and paths in the game map.

 Game Characters

Avatar
Soldier Exling
Warrior Exling
Commando Exling
Ninja Exling
Boss Exling
NPCs: Towers
Fire Tower
Lightning Tower
Ice Tower
Gun Tower
